artist: Artist: Nicolas Africano; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man seated in a chair wearing baggy pants; arms bent at elbows; hands up palms toward face
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop
markings: lower edge center: VEL chop mark: LL in pencil: [A.P. 5/5]
signed: lower margin right in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]: at top in grey: [February March April May/ He talks to himself at night]
title: He Talks to Himself at Night, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
